000633.SZ.summary: Xinjiang Hejin Holding Co., Ltd. produces and sells nickel-based alloy materials in China. The company offers K-500, 718, R405, corrosion-resistant materials and welding materials, electrical vacuum materials, electrical resistance heating alloy materials, spark plug electrodes materials, temperature measurement materials, nickel and nickel alloy wires for electrodes and wires, pump shaft-2, pump shaft-1, pump shaft-3, and spline bushing. The company was formerly known as Shenyang Hejin Holding Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Xinjiang Hejin Holding Co., Ltd. in October 2017. Xinjiang Hejin Holding Co., Ltd. was founded in 1987 and is based in Hetian, China.

002295.SZ.summary: Guangdong Jingyi Metal Co., Ltd. engages in copper processing business in China. The company offers thread copper tubes, micro heat pipes, cable copper tubes, microwave brass tubes, and precision copper fittings for gas. It also provides supply chain trading platform. The company was founded in 1999 and is based in Foshan, China.

002328.SZ.summary: Shanghai Xinpeng Industry Co.,Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells metal electromechanical parts primarily in China. The company manufactures various kinds of tooling and metal parts through stamping and sheet metal processes. Its products include molds, motors, stampings, auto parts, and plasma base plates, as well as OEM and CNC products. The company serves multinational corporations. Shanghai Xinpeng Industry Co.,Ltd. is based in Shanghai, China.

002392.SZ.summary: Beijing Lier High-temperature Materials Co.,Ltd. produces and sells various refractories for the iron and steel, and coal chemical industries. The company offers ladle, blast furnace, and tundish refractories; refractories for heating furnaces; and refractory materials for converters and electric furnaces, and waste incinerators, as well as the non-ferrous metallurgical industry. It also provides casting function series refractory materials, including tundish upper nozzles, long nozzles, stopper rods, and immersion nozzles for thin slab continuous casting, as well as tundish nozzles with zirconium; and refractory insulation fiber products. The company has operations in China, Russia, Ukraine, Malaysia, Vietnam, Indonesia, India, Thailand, and internationally. Beijing Lier High-temperature Materials Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Beijing, China.

002426.SZ.long_name: Suzhou Victory Precision Manufacture Co., Ltd.
002426.SZ.summary: Suzhou Victory Precision Manufacture Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sale of precision mechanical modules primarily in China. The company's products are used in TV stands, TV front bezels and back covers, and notebooks. It serves a range of TV brands and manufacturers. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.

002487.SZ.summary: Dajin Heavy Industry Corporation manufactures and sells steel structures in the onshore and offshore energy industry primarily in China. It offers onshore products, including onshore wind towers and other steel structure products; and offshore products consisting of offshore monopiles transition pieces, tripods, jackets, secondary steels, etc. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Fuxin, China.

002514.SZ.summary: Suzhou Boamax Technologies Group Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells industrial grade structural CNC sheet metal products. It offers flue gas flow monitoring equipment used in the field of environmental protection, such as online monitoring about gas velocity, as well as pulverized coal flow rate and online monitoring of wind speed. The company also provides high voltage electrode boilers for the nuclear power project and for the enterprises and institutions to provide steam and hot water; and coal to electricity central heating projects that comprise integrated high voltage electrode boilers, off-peak electricity, energy storage technology, and other resources. In addition, it offers automation wet process equipment for the production of crystalline solar silicon cells; and precise sheet metal products for use in various fields, including electrical, communications, finance, medical, renewable energy, automotive, and other related fields. Suzhou Boamax Technologies Group Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is based in Suzhou, China.

002524.SZ.long_name: Guangzheng Eye Hospital Group Co., Ltd.
002524.SZ.summary: Guangzheng Eye Hospital Group Co., Ltd. engages in the steel construction business in China. The company is involved in the design, manufacture, installation, and after-sales service of light steel, heavy steel, multi-story steel, and space and long-span steel structures, as well as construction of steel bridges and systems. It constructs multi-story, and civil and commercial steel structures; power stations; petroleum, chemical, metallurgy, electronics, manufacturing, and other light and heavy industrial plants; convention and exhibition centers; and airport terminals. The company also sells natural gas, including pipeline natural gas and automotive natural gas; and LPG comprising pipeline LPG and bottled LPG. In addition, it invests in and manages eye hospitals. The company also exports its products to Almaty, Kyrgyzstan, Himkent, Bishkek, Astana, and Dushanbe. Guangzheng Eye Hospital Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Urumqi, China.

002541.SZ.long_name: Anhui Honglu Steel Construction(Group) CO., LTD
002541.SZ.summary: Anhui Honglu Steel Construction(Group) CO., LTD manufactures and sells steel structures and related products in China and internationally. It offers steel structures for industrial buildings, steel structures for residences, and customized bungalows. The company also produces and sells building materials and three-dimensional garages. In addition, it engages in the industrial real estate investment and construction operations; and green steel structural property development activities. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Hefei, China.

002552.SZ.summary: Baoding Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of various forgings and castings in China. It offers products for mining machinery, electric power engineering, technology, ocean engineering, and hoisting machinery. The company's products are primarily used in shipbuilding, ocean-engineering, power station, petrochemical, engineering machinery, pressure vessels, military, and other industries. It also exports its products to Germany, France, Finland, Canada, Singapore, and internationally. The company was formerly known as Baoding Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Baoding Technology Co., Ltd. in February 2016. Baoding Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is based in Hangzhou, China.

002633.SZ.summary: Shenke Slide Bearing Corporation manufactures and sells bearings for use in AC and DC motors, generators, turbines, fans, pumps, compressors, and other rotating machines in China. The company offers hydro, thermal, nuclear, wind, and other mechanical products, as well as plain bearing. It serves machinery, chemical, power, steel, water conservancy, metallurgy, mining, cement, and other industries. The company also exports its products to Pakistan, Turkey, India, Japan, Australia, Bangladesh, Britain, and other countries. Shenke Slide Bearing Corporation was founded in 1996 and is based in Zhuji, China.

002760.SZ.long_name: Anhui Fengxing Wear Resistant Materials Co., Ltd.
002760.SZ.summary: Anhui Fengxing Wear Resistant Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and technical services of metal casting wear-resistant materials primarily in the People's Republic of China. It offers grinding mediums, resistant steel products, mill liners, resist materials, hammer crushers, counterattack crushers, jaw crushers, and cooling machines. The company provides its products under the phoenix brand. Its products are used in metallurgical mining, building materials, cement, thermal power, and magnetic materials industries, as well as grinding materials production. The company also exports its products to Australia, the Philippines, Japan, Indonesia, South Korea, the United States, and other countries and regions. Anhui Fengxing Wear Resistant Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Ningguo, the People's Republic of China.

002786.SZ.long_name: Shenzhen Silver Basis Technology Co., Ltd.
002786.SZ.summary: Shenzhen Silver Basis Technology Co., Ltd. provides precision molds in China and internationally. It offers automatic tooling and equipment, including automotive tooling, gauge and gripper, and installation equipment; auto parts comprising exterior parts, interior trims, function pieces, and security systems; and plastic structural parts, hardware structures, and precision molds. The company also provides BHRT hot runner products, such as needle valve type hot runner control systems and hot runner assemblies; and B + ODM/OEM products, as well as industrial design works. Shenzhen Silver Basis Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

002855.SZ.summary: Dongguan Chitwing Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells precision structural parts and molds in China. Its products are used in mobile phones, tablet computers, wearable products, and medical equipment components. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in Dongguan, China. Dongguan Chitwing Technology Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Chit Wing Technology Group Company Limited.

002921.SZ.long_name: Shandong Liancheng Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd
002921.SZ.summary: Shandong Liancheng Precision Manufacturing Co., Ltd engages in the design, development, manufacture, and sale of iron casts and aluminum alloys in China and internationally. Its products are used in passenger cars, commercial vehicles, engineering/agricultural machinery, hydraulic machinery, commercial air conditioning, medical equipment, environmental equipment, high-speed rail, and solar energy industries and fields. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jining, China.

002965.SZ.summary: Lucky Harvest Co.,Ltd. engages in the development, production, and sale of precision stamping dies and structural metal parts in China. Its products include home appliance accessories, auto accessories, mold parts, power cabinet accessories, aluminum parts, communication device accessories, chassis cabinets, kitchen utensils, and energy conservation and emission reduction parts. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Dongguan City, China.

002976.SZ.long_name: Suzhou Cheersson Precision Metal Forming Co., Ltd.
002976.SZ.summary: Suzhou Cheersson Precision Metal Forming Co., Ltd. produces and sells communication equipment parts. The company offers powertrain cases and shells, as well as parts for multimedia intelligent, sealing, security, and brake systems. Its products include brake control unit boxes and covers, safety buckles, safety curtain guide brackets, control boxes, airbag covers, and aluminum back covers. The company was incorporated in 2012 and is based in Suzhou, China.

012800.KS.summary: Daechang Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells brass-related products in South Korea. It offers its products under the BRASSONE brands. The company was formerly known as Daechang Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Daechang Co., Ltd. in 2010. Daechang Co., Ltd. was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Siheung, South Korea.

021050.KS.summary: Seowon Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells non-ferrous metals in South Korea. The company offers brass billets, slabs, and ingots, as well as bronze ingots; and recycles brass ash, granular brass and aluminum, clove, sludge, mill berry, oxidized copper, and grinding powder, as well as copper rods for electric wires and copper billets. Its products are used in various applications, such as cars and industrial machinery parts, electrical and electronic equipment parts, ship building components and firefighting facilities, faucets, heat exchange appliances parts, and high-tech equipment and heavy industry products. The company was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Ansan, South Korea.

0255.HK.summary: Lung Kee (Bermuda) Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and markets mold bases and related products in the People's Republic of China and internationally. The company is headquartered in Sha Tin, Hong Kong. Lung Kee (Bermuda) Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Pan Island Investments Limited.

025820.KS.summary: Leeku Industrial Co., Ltd. operates in the non-ferrous material industry in South Korea. It offers oxygen-free, tough pitch, and phosphorus deoxidized copper; red brass; brass; phosphor bronze; and other alloys, including detonator brass, naval brass, tin brass, tin copper, LEEKU ferrous copper, and CuFe2P. The company was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Ansan, South Korea.

058430.KS.long_name: POSCO COATED & COLOR STEEL Co., Ltd.
058430.KS.summary: POSCO COATED & COLOR STEEL Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture, processing, and sale of coated, molten galvanized, and aluminized steel sheets in South Korea and internationally. It offers coated steel sheets for use in vehicles, home appliances, and building materials; and color coated steel sheets for use in exterior and interior building materials, as well as in boilers, electronic furniture, agriculture machines, etc. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Pohang, South Korea. POSCO COATED & COLOR STEEL Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of POSCO.

092440.KS.summary: Kishin Corporation provides mold bases, die sets, and precision plates in South Korea. The company's die set products include stripper, die set, and MG guides, as well as shanks and press guide parts. Its mold products are used in the manufacture of mobile handsets, vehicles, and other products. The company was founded in 1975 and is based in Incheon, South Korea.

0929.HK.summary: IPE Group Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells precision metal components and assembled parts for automotive parts, hydraulic equipment, hard disk drives (HDD), and electronic and other devices. The company provides automotive components, such as fuel injectors and automatic transmission products; and hydraulic precision components, such as valves, spools, and joy stick components. It also offers robots that have applications in automotive, medical, electronic, food, laboratory, industrial, packaging, electronic, and consumer industries; CNC and other equipment; and HDD components, including pivot shafts and housings, and spindle motor shafts and housing components that are used in the assembly of pivot cartridges and spindle motors of HDDs. In addition, the company provides surface and deburring treatment services, as well as manufactures and trades in intelligent equipment. It operates in Thailand, Malaysia, Mainland China, Macau, Hong Kong, North America, Europe, and internationally. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Kowloon, Hong Kong. IPE Group Limited is a subsidiary of Baoan Technology Company Limited.

0976.HK.summary: Chiho Environmental Group Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the metal recycling business in Asia, Europe, and North America. It is involved in the recycling of mixed metal into copper, aluminum, and ferrous metals. The company also recycles end-of-life vehicles, wasted oil, and electrical and electronic wastes; and owns and operates foundries to manufacture aluminum ingots. In addition, it wholesales metal scrap without processing; processes and sells metal scrap and lubricating oil; provides industrial and logistics services; and purchases and administers real estate properties. The company was formerly known as Chiho-Tiande Group Limited and changed its name to Chiho Environmental Group Limited in June 2017. Chiho Environmental Group Limited is headquartered in Central, Hong Kong. Chiho Environmental Group Limited is a subsidiary of USUM Investment Group Hong Kong Limited.

103140.KS.summary: Poongsan Corporation develops, manufactures, markets, exports, and sells fabricated nonferrous metal, defense, and precision forging products in South Korea and internationally. It offers copper and copper alloy sheets, strips, and rods, as well as thin plates, bimetals, and coin blanks; leadframe materials; titanium tubes; stainless steel strips; and copper-based roofing materials. The company's copper and copper alloy sheets and strips are used for interior and exterior applications in commercial and residential real estate, construction, machinery, automobiles, electrical and electronics, semiconductors, telecommunication, and electronic parts industries. It also provides military ammunitions, including small arms, anti-aircraft guns, mortars, howitzers, tank guns, recoilless guns, naval guns, and mid-to large-size weaponries; commercial ammunitions, such as precision made cartridges for recreational hunting and competitive shooting; and semi-finished products and components used in the production of ammunitions, such as primers, fuses, bullet jacket cups, case cups, discs, cones, rotating bands, links, tungsten penetrators, and shell bodies, as well as fuses for use in naval ammunitions, mortar shells, and multiple launch rocket systems. In addition, the company produces chemicals, such as nitrocellulose and nitroglycerine for use in propellants; and precision products, including connector parts for electric and electronic industries, multi-guage copper strips, precision dies, gauges and tools, and metal machinery and facilities. Further, it builds metal processing machineries and other customized equipment for the steel, automobile, and defense industries; and specializes in rolling related products, such as annealing, pickling, degreasing, buffing, tin plating, and slitting machineries, as well as scalping lines and rolling oil coolant systems. Poongsan Corporation was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

1050.HK.summary: Karrie International Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, provides metal and plastic products, and electronic manufacturing services (EMS) worldwide. It operates in three segments: Metal and Plastic Business; EMS Business; and Real Estate Business. The Metal and Plastic Business segment manufactures and sells metal and plastic products, including server casings, molds, plastic and metal parts, and household products. The EMS Business segment manufactures and sells magnetic tape data storage products, point-of-sale systems, office automation products, and other computer peripherals. The Real Estate Business segment engages in urban renewal, real estate project investment, property leasing, and development operations. The company also engages in the sale of visual accessories and metal stamping dies; and property holding, trading, and management operations. Karrie International Holdings Limited was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong.

1517.TW.summary: Leechi Machinery Industry Ltd. Co. manufactures and sells bicycle components in Taiwan and internationally. Its product portfolio includes disc brakes, brakes and levers, seat posts, stems, handle bars, part accessories, and other products. The company provides its products under the PROMAX brand. The company was formerly known as Leechi Enterprise Co. Ltd. Leechi Machinery Industry Ltd. Co. was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Changhua City, Taiwan.

1586.TWO.summary: China Fineblanking Technology Co.,Ltd. develops and sells fine blanking products in China, Taiwan, and Malaysia. The company offers HDD VCM, gearbox parking and shifting mechanisms, door locks, hydraulic pumps, powertrains, brake parts, seat parts, gear boxes and clutches, gear box parts, synchronize rings, bicycling cassettes, and other products. The company was founded in 1992 and is based in Changhua, Taiwan.

1589.TW.long_name: Yeong Guan Energy Technology Group Co., Ltd.
1589.TW.summary: Yeong Guan Energy Technology Group Co., Ltd. supplies castings to manufacturers of wind turbines, injection molding machines, machine tools, and other heavy industrial machines. It offers low-temperature high tensile spheroidal graphite iron casting and gray cast iron casting for energy applications, which include large scale wind turbines, such as hubs, gear boxes, and bases; and steam turbine components for large scale power plants. The company also provides high-grade spheroidal graphite iron casting for injection molding machines; and large scale high precision machine tools, air compressors, large-scale rapid color printing machines, and medical equipment, which consists of cancer therapeutic, and gamma knife therapeutic apparatus. In addition, it offers casting, processing, welding, painting, assembly capability, and testing equipment. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Ningbo, China.

1787.T.summary: Nakabohtec Corrosion Protecting Co.,Ltd. provides survey, analysis, design, engineering, work supervision, and material supply services for protecting metallic structures from corrosion. The company was formerly known as Nakagawa corrosion Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Nakabohtec Corrosion Protecting Co.,Ltd. in 1991. Nakabohtec Corrosion Protecting Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

1891.HK.summary: Heng Hup Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, operates as a scrap ferrous metal trader in Malaysia and internationally. It purchases scrap ferrous metals from various sources, and processes and sells them to steel mills. The company trades in scrap ferrous metals, used batteries, waste paper, and other scraps. Its customers for used batteries and waste paper are lead smelting plants and paper mills. The company was founded in 1996 and is headquartered in Shah Alam, Malaysia. Heng Hup Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of 5S Holdings (BVI) Limited.

1A4.SI.summary: AGV Group Limited, an investment holding company, provides hot dip galvanizing services to steel and iron fabrication industries in Singapore and Malaysia. The company also engages in consultation and contract works relating to galvanization. It serves customers in public and transport sectors. The company was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Singapore.

1CA0.F.summary: Componenta Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides cast iron components in Sweden, Finland, Benelux countries, Germany, other European countries, and internationally. The company offers non-machined, machined, and painted iron cast components, as well as leases office spaces and industrial premises. It primarily serves machine building, agricultural machinery, forestry machines, energy, defense, and other industries. The company was founded in 1918 and is headquartered in Vantaa, Finland.

1Y0.F.summary: Yamashina Corporation plans, manufactures, and sells metal products in Japan, China, Hong Kong, and Thailand. The company offers tapping fasteners for metals, resins, and thin plates; aluminum alloy fasteners, CFRP fasteners, loosening prevention fasteners, caulking bolts, washer built-in screws, and head shape products; and custom-made products, such as neck tight screws and small metal parts, as well as other products for weight reduction, prevention of loosening, thin plate fastening, and electric corrosion measures. It serves automobile, home appliances/industrial equipment, medical equipment, robot, and architecture industries. The company was founded in 1917 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

2060.HK.summary: Pujiang International Group Limited, a technology-based manufacturing company, manufactures, installations, and sells customised prestressed steel materials and cables in the People's Republic of China. The company's Cable Business segment provides long-span suspension bridges and long-span cable-stayed cables under the Pujiang Cable brand used for various cable-structured projects, such as cablestayed bridges, tied arch bridges, mast towers, and roofs. Its Prestressed Materials Business segment offers rare earth coated, plain surface, and galvanized prestressed materials under the Ossen brand used in manufacturing and construction projects. Pujiang International Group Limited was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Shanghai, the People's Republic of China.

2474.TW.summary: Catcher Technology Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells aluminum and magnesium extrusions, and stamping products and molds in Taiwan and China. It offers casing, internal components, molds, and thermal modules for electronic products. The company's products include upper case, lower case, keyboard cover, and monitor casings for notebook computers; casings for various server specifications and desktop computers; industrial computer casings and internal parts; and computer accessories, such as plugs and A/V connector casings. The company also produces customized thin and precision-oriented communication application products, such as phones and pad-like products, as well as communication accessories, such as earphones and camera heads; and consumer electronic products, such as digital still cameras, camcorders, MP3 products, and related accessories. In addition, it offers ventilation blades, air-power tools, automobiles, TVs and lightning equipment. Further, the company manufactures, sells, and develops varied metal products; and engages in the trading, leasing, and investing activities. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Tainan, Taiwan.

300185.SZ.summary: Tongyu Heavy Industry Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of forgings and castings. It offers wind power generator main shafts, ductile iron casting pipe moulds, cold work rolls, support rolls, steam turbine and generator rotor shafts, crank shafts, marine shafts, pressure pipeline products, supercritical boiler pipes, pressure vessel forgings, machine tool bed products, wind power diesel engine body hubs, forging blanks, ESR ingots, etc. The company also designs and manufactures various general and non-standard equipment and parts. It serves metallurgy, mining, hydroelectric and thermal power, nuclear and wind power, shipbuilding, petroleum chemical, heavy machinery, marine engineering, aerospace, mould, and other industries. The company is based in Yucheng, China.

300328.SZ.summary: DongGuan EONTEC Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of light alloy materials in China and internationally. It offers amorphous alloy products, CE parts, notebook parts, and structural auto parts for use in the consumer electronics, medical equipment, communications equipment, and automotive equipment, as well as in the aerospace, biomedicine, precision machinery, and other applications. The company was founded in 1993 and is based in Dongguan, China.

300345.SZ.summary: Hunan Huamin Holdings Co., Ltd. engages in research, development, production, and sale of wear-resistant castings in China. The company provides integrated ball mill technology products, including Cr-Mn-W wear resistant cast iron grinding balls, integral step type lining plates, wear-resistant plastic and cast steel combined lining plates, split step type lining plates, and discharge grate rings; and programmable ion permeate technology products, such as piston rods, molds, pin and shaft sleeves, high strength bolts, wheel gears, clutch plates and brake pads, core shafts, piston rings, and valve rods. It also offers high-energy ion beam 3D spray welding technology products comprising rollers, wind turbine impellers, bucket tooth, glass plates, valve cones and valve seats, and ball mill liners. In addition, the company provides vanadium-titanium slag slurry pumps; multilayer roasting furnaces; hammers; clean coal powder upgrading furnaces; high-manganese steel ring gears; metal ceramic tubes for abrasion resistant faucets; metal ceramic erosion resistance arrow-type back-pressure valves; metal ceramic couplings for abrasion resistant oil well tubings; metal ceramic valve balls and valve seats of oil well pumps; anti-abrasion metal ceramic plungers; new generation slurry pump metal ceramic cylinder sleeves; abrasion/erosion resistant polycrystalline tungsten titanium ball valves; and crosslinked polystyrenes. The company was formerly known as Honyu Wear-Resistant New Materials Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hunan Huamin Holdings Co., Ltd. in July 2020. Hunan Huamin Holdings Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is based in Changsha, China.

300539.SZ.summary: Ningbo Henghe Mould Co., Ltd. researches, develops, designs, manufactures, and sells precision injection molds. It is also involved in the injection molding and assembly of products. The company's products are used in home appliances, medical equipment parts, sanitary ware parts, laptop parts, electronic components, connectors, automotive parts, motors, pipe joints, etc. It also exports its products to the United States, France, Switzerland, Germany, Italy, Japan, etc. Ningbo Henghe Mould Co., Ltd. was founded in 1992 and is based in Cixi, China.

300631.SZ.summary: JiangSu JiuWu Hi-Tech Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells ceramic membranes in China. The company provides ceramic membranes element, module, machine lab and pilot, and filtration systems, as well as flat sheet membranes. It offers organic membrane modules, machine lab and pilots, and filtration systems. Its products are used in various industries such as food and beverage, bio-pharm, chemical and petro chemical, water and wastewater treatment, gas cleaning system, river and lake cleaning, and seawater desalination. JiangSu JiuWu Hi-Tech Co., Ltd. was founded in 1997 and is based in Nanjing, China.

300690.SZ.summary: Shandong Shuangyi Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, design, production, sale, and service of composite products in China and internationally. Its products include non-metallic mold machining products, including wind turbine blade, wind turbine nacelle cover, yacht, automobile integral car body, small airplane wing, and truck head end molds; wind turbine nacelle covers, such as nacelle and hub covers, and nose cones; and advanced composite material products comprising carbon fiber UAV shells, airplane nacelles, wing fuselage cowlings, panels, tubes, and special-shaped products. The company also offers engineering machinery cover body and agricultural machinery shell body products; public and rail transit products, which include automobile car bodies, air-condition covers, side roof plates, and front and rear lamps, as well as motor car head ends, motor car interior trims, bullet train integrated restrooms, and motor car cabs; and yacht and boat hulls consisting of luxury yacht, electric boat, rowing boat FRP, and pedal boat FRP hulls. In addition, it provides medical equipment shells, including CT machine, nuclear magnetic resonance FRP, ultrasonic wave FRP, X-ray machine FRP, and analysis meter FRP shells; and battery covers and bottom guard boards for automotive field. Further, it engages in the assembling of bottom guard boards. Shandong Shuangyi Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Dezhou, China.

300767.SZ.summary: QuakeSafe Technologies Co., Ltd. develops, produces, and sells anti-seismic products and shock absorber products in China. The company offers building isolation rubber support block products, such as rubber bearings for building isolation; elastic slip bearings; and high damping rubber isolation bearings, as well as viscoelastic and metal mild steel dampers. It is also involved in the anti-seismic product testing; installation guidance and replacement; anti-seismic building monitoring; and after-sales maintenance activities. The company was formerly known as Yunnan QuakeSafe Seismic Isolation Technologies Co., Ltd. and changed its name to QuakeSafe Technologies Co., Ltd. in June 2019. QuakeSafe Technologies Co., Ltd. is headquartered in Kunming, China.

300817.SZ.summary: Zhejiang Sf Oilless Bearing Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells sliding bearing/bushing series products in China. The company offers self-lubricating, boundary lubricating, solid lubrication, and oil or grease lubricating bearings, as well as sliding blocks, shock absorber parts, and gear pump bushing blocks. Its products have applications in the fields of hydraulic system, car and truck, engineering machinery, die/mold industry, office equipment, steel metallurgy, industrial automation, agricultural machinery, clean source of energy, oil drilling platform, medical devices, injection molding of plastics, and pressure diecasts. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Jiashan, China.

300850.SZ.long_name: Luoyang Xinqianglian Slewing Bearing Co., Ltd.
300850.SZ.summary: Luoyang Xinqianglian Slewing Bearing Co., Ltd. manufactures heavy duty slewing bearings for industrial purposes in China and internationally. The company offers four-point contact ball, double row ball, three-row roller, ball-roller combination, and cross-roller slewing bearings. Its products are used in various applications, which include cranes, wind turbines, tunnel boring machines, concrete pump trucks, CT scanners, stackers and reclaimers, etc. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Luoyang, China.

300885.SZ.summary: Yangzhou Seashine New Materials Co.,Ltd. engages in the design, production, and marketing of various powder metallurgy structural parts in China. The company offers external gears, bevel gears, gear rings, double teeths, sprockets, rotors, eccentric cams, swing arms, etc. Its products are applied in electric tools, automobiles, household appliances, office applications, etc. The company also exports its products to the United States, Germany, the Czech Republic, Hungary, Russia, Brazil and Mexico, India, Japan, the Philippines, Malaysia, and Hong Kong. Yangzhou Seashine New Materials Co.,Ltd. is based in Yangzhou, China.

300946.SZ.summary: Hengda New Materials (Fujian) Co.,Ltd produces, sells, and services metal materials in China and internationally. It offers rule die steel, steel rules, utility knifes, bi-metal band saw blades, bi-metal strips, circular saw blades, CNC circular saw machines, cutting machines, and five-axis linkage jewelry engraving machines. The company was formerly known as Putian Hengda Machinery and Electricity Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Hengda New Materials (Fujian) Co.,Ltd in 2018. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Putian, China.

300953.SZ.summary: Ningbo Zhenyu Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures molds and dies. It specializes in progressive die and rotor die casting that are used for stator and rotor motor laminations. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Ningbo, China.

3024.T.summary: Create Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the wholesale of plumbing materials under the TORO brand in Japan. The company offers plumbing fittings and water taps, water supply pipe equipment, and drainage pipe equipment; and housing equipment, such as air-conditioners. It is also involved in the import of iron castings; sale of drainage pipe fittings and drainage implements; construction and package of drainage implements; processing and production of resinous plumbing systems; construction; interior finishing works; and buildings design and building materials sales activities. The company was formerly known as Fukui Kazuo Shoten Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Create Corporation in April 1993. Create Corporation was founded in 1916 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

3303.TWO.summary: Univacco Technology Inc. manufactures and sells stamping foil products and optoelectronics materials worldwide. The company offers various decorative and functional foils, which include hot stamping, cold, holographic, and digital foils. The company also provides optoelectronics materials, including clean and PET protective films, diffuser, SMD cover tapes, medical films, and OEM for coating. The company provides its products for wine, beer, and spirits label and packaging; food, drink, and confectionery packaging; tobacco/cigarette packaging; greeting cards and printed media; artificial leather book covers; persona care; cosmetics and perfumes; pharmaceuticals; and clothing and textile applications. It markets its products under the UNIVACCO brand. The company was formerly known as Tai Leng Industry Co., Ltd and changed its name to Univacco Technology Inc. in 2002. Univacco Technology Inc. was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

3376.TW.summary: Shin Zu Shing Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells precision springs, stamped parts, and hinge assemblies in Taiwan. It also provides metal injection molding (MIM) and lathe products. The company offers its products for use in notebook and tablet PCs, LCD monitors, and MIM products, as well as communication, computer, and consumer products. The company was formerly known as Zu Shing Spring and Mechanical Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Shin Zu Shing Co., Ltd. in 1997. Shin Zu Shing Co., Ltd. was founded in 1965 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

3435.T.summary: Sanko Techno Co., Ltd. researches and develops, constructs, manufactures, and sells construction materials, composites, and waterproofing materials in Japan. Its construction materials include post-installation anchors, industrial fasteners, and drill bits. The company also provides earthquake resistant reinforcement systems to protect schools, hospitals, highways, railway bridges, and other structures from possible earthquake damage. Sanko Techno Co., Ltd. was founded in 1964 and is headquartered in Nagareyama, Japan.

3440.T.summary: NISSO PRONITY Co., Ltd. provides various metal products. The company offers environment related products, panels, bed and section steel products, parking lot/bicycle parking materials, agriculture animal husbandry materials, tile materials, sheet metals, roofs, wall materials, interior and exterior materials, and others. Its products are used in various industries, including building and construction materials, environment, energy, factory and plant, parking lot, temporary/prefabricated semiconductors, agriculture, and livestock industries. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Minami, Japan.

3441.T.summary: SANNO Co., Ltd. engages in the precious metal surface treatment of electronic parts with the focus on connectors in Japan. The company's products are used in PC related products, mobile handsets, digital appliances, electronic cards, semiconductor facilities, gaming devices, automobile devices, and other devices. SANNO Co., Ltd. was founded in 1958 and is based in Yokohama, Japan.

3447.T.summary: Shinwa Co., Ltd. provides construction and logistic equipment in Japan. It offers system and general scaffolding equipment; hanging and mesh pallets; pallets for pipes, system scaffolding, and preceding handrails; and optional parts, such as pre-installed handrails. Shinwa Co., Ltd. was founded in 1977 and is headquartered in Kaizu, Japan.

3449.T.summary: Technoflex Corporation provides flexible metal hoses, expansion joints, and multi-layer pipes. The company also offers formed bellows, vacuum components, and fluoroplastic hoses. Its products are used for various applications, such as construction pipes, city water pipes, semiconductors, iron manufacturing, shipbuilding, city gas, LP gas, electricity, thermal power, nuclear power, and general plants. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Tokyo, japan.

3631.TWO.summary: Chernan Metal Industrial Corp. manufactures and sells tin and tin wire products in Taiwan. It also offers solder paste and flux products; copper and nickel; and germanium. The company was formerly known as Tunghui Tin Industry. Chernan Metal Industrial Corp. was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

3663.TWO.summary: ThinTech Materials Technology Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sell alloys and optoelectronics materials in Taiwan, Mainland China, Japan, Europe, and the North America. Its products include sputtering targets for flat panel display planar, optical data storage, decorative and functional coating, passive component, optical element, and semi-conductive; and thin film targets for solar cell applications. It also offers flat panel display rotary sputtering targets; alloy metal powders for vacuum induction gas atomization; nickel alloy c-hook for coil wire pickling; sputtering target bonding services; precious metal refining and sales services; analytical services; and metal powder for 3D printing, as well as acid and alkali-resistance alloy, and titanium for cooking/tableware. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.

3816.HK.summary: KFM Kingdom Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, manufactures and sells precision metal stamping and metal lathing products in the People's Republic of China, North America, Europe, Japan, Singapore, and internationally. It also manufactures and sells fine metal products; sells and rents kiosks; manufactures and trades in senor products; trades in medical products; and provides management services. In addition, the company offers integrated services, including design engineering solutions; prototyping, computer numerical control (CNC) laser cutting, CNC tooling design and tooling mold design, and lathing or machining parts; hard tooling and soft tooling services; secondary processing services comprising laser welding or robotic argon welding, riveting, tapping, drilling, polishing, sand blasting, etc.; and post-treatment processing services, such as silk screening printing, heat treatment, plating, coating, etc., as well as product assembly and quality testing services. Additionally, it provides packaging solutions. It serves medical and test equipment, finance equipment, consumer electronics, network/data storage, and office automation industries. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong. KFM Kingdom Holdings Limited is a subsidiary of Massive Force Limited.

3MF.AX.summary: 3D Metalforge Limited provides metal additive manufacturing solutions worldwide. It offers in-house metal printing services, including design and engineering, material advisory, diagnostics and testing, printing, and post-production services. The company was founded in 2012 and is based in West Perth, Australia.

4530.TWO.summary: Honyi International Company Limited manufactures and sells plastic injection molds. The company offers precision thermoplastic injection molds for use in various applications, including automotive, home appliances, computer, consumers, communication, electronics, etc. It also provides various enclosure manufacturing services, such as tooling fabrication, injection molding, sheet metal stamping, secondary post-molding process, and final assembly services in automotive, home appliance, and information tech. applications. Honyi International Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.

4553.TWO.summary: ALFOT Technologies Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, and sells OEM aluminum forging products primarily in Taiwan. The company offers automotive aluminum forging parts, including brackets, control arms, suspension arms, pistons, etc. for use in suspension and cushion systems in car chassis, as well as in engine systems; and motorcycle aluminum forging parts, such as connectors, handgrips, driving arms, pistons, etc. that are used in the body structure of motorcycles, steering systems, and engine systems. It also provides other aluminum forging parts comprising storz, check handgrip, bundle, spray gun, etc. for use in fire-fighting equipment, industrial equipment, machinery industry, hand tool industry, and bicycle industry. ALFOT Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is based in Taichung, Taiwan.

4561.TWO.summary: Kenturn Nano. Tec. Co., Ltd. designs, manufactures, fabricates, and markets machine tool spindles in Taiwan. It offers CNC machining center, tapping center, and direct and gear drive spindles; turning center spindles, which includes belt drive-horizontal and vertical spindles; and CNC internal and external spindles. The company also provides square, ball nose, and corner radius end mills; special cutting tools; and spindle repair service. Its products are used in aerospace, automotive, locomotive, biotechnology, woodworking machines, shipbuilding, medical equipment, electronic semiconductor manufacturing, and IT industries under the KENTURN brand name. The company also exports its products. Kenturn Nano. Tec. Co., Ltd. was founded in 1983 and is based in Changhua, Taiwan.

4912.TW.summary: Lemtech Holdings Co., Limited manufactures and sells precision metal dies and metal stampings in Asia, Americas, and Europe. The company provides electronic product thermal modules, electronic product components, automotive components and building material components made by stamping and forming, as well as stamping die support for automotive and electronic product manufacturers; and stamping tools, heatsinks and thermal modules, slide rails, precision metal hinges, and mechanical assemblies. It serves automotive, cloud computing, smartphone, medical device, and industrial, as well as computing, consumer, and communication markets. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5009.TWO.summary: Gloria Material Technology Corp. manufactures and sells alloy steel and valve-parts in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products include super and titanium alloys; and high cleaning steel, alloy tool steel, high speed steel, stainless steel, quenched-tempered steel, and mold material supply products. It also provides machined parts, such as actuators, blocks, boss products, load caps, and actuator blanks; compressor spacers, seals for gas turbine, turbine blades, and transmission shafts; and copper rod rollers, dummy bar heads, guide rolls, sendzimir rolls, and rolls for slab continuous cast. In addition, the company offers air compressor rotors, bolts, couplings, cryogenic BV shafts, HPBV shafts, locking pins, parts for vacuum equipment, pump shafts, pipe fittings, plugs, turbo charger parts, wheel rings, stems, and taper pins. It serves aerospace, energy, oil and gas, water, medical, and machinery and mold industries. Gloria Material Technology Corp. was founded in 1988 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.

5223.TWO.summary: Anli International Co., Ltd. primarily engages in the development, production, assembly, and sale of various precision metal stamping and magnesium aluminum die casting in China and Taiwan. The company is also involved in the design, research, and development of electronic components, vehicle components, new metal materials, machine parts, communication equipment, and computer software; manufacture of fine blanking die products; inductance components; metal finishing activities; and installation of automated equipment, as well as in CNC processing business.It also provides automotive products, optical communication products, vision system application products, household products, and other products. The company's stamped and cast metallic parts and components are used in notebook PCs, tablet PCs, desktop PCs, cell phones, wearable devices, internet communications, home appliances, and daily items. It primarily serves the computers, communications, and consumer electronics industries. The company was founded in 2010 and is headquartered in Grand Cayman, the Cayman Islands.

5460.TWO.summary: Mustang Industrial Corp. manufactures and sells progressive die molds and stamping products in Taiwan. The company provides shielding frame and cover assemblies for tuners; metal stamped frames and covers for signal shielding; and large size metal stamping products, including cover and chassis of set top box and satellite receivers, as well as heat spreaders for IC/chipsets and drawn parts in various shapes. It also offers middle size stamping parts, such as metal frames, brackets, and plates for LCD panels; small size stamping parts comprising springs and contacting fingers for EMC solution; and high precision stamping parts, including micro punching/blanking technology to replace chemical etching, as well as terminals, jumpers, contact springs, etc. Mustang Industrial Corp. was founded in 1972 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.

5603.T.summary: Kogi Corporation engages in casting roll-related, and machinery and environment-related businesses in Japan. The company offers various rolling rolls, steel castings, etc.; castings for steel ingot molds, automobile press dies, and industrial machinery; and public civil engineering castings, such as ground manholes, grating, iron lids for electric wire utility tunnels, etc. It also provides industrial castings, including water and sewerage, railway, and industrial machinery related parts; and continuous cast-iron rods comprising ordinary cast iron, ductile cast iron, ni-resist cast iron, and special alloy cast iron materials. In addition, the company offers blowers, transvectors, vortex schoolers, etc.; KC metal fibers and KC carbon ceramics; and stoker type waste incinerators, recycling equipment, various deodorization equipment, superheated steam application drying and carbonization equipment, etc. Kogi Corporation was founded in 1916 and is headquartered in Himeji, Japan.

5644.T.summary: Metalart Corporation engages in the manufacture, sale, and machining of hot forged, precise, and closed-die-forged products for automobiles, construction and agricultural machinery, ships, and other industrial machinery in Japan and internationally. The company primarily offers engine parts, such as crank shafts and connecting rods, as well as precision forged gears, CVT products, automatic and manual transmission parts, chassis parts, track links, and other parts, as well as assembles crawlers. It is also involved in the manufacture, heat treatment, and surface treatment of precise forged products; and hot and cold forging, hot press forging, hot hammer forging, machining, and manufacture of dies. The company was formerly known as Goto Drop Forging Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Metalart Corporation in October 1991. Metalart Corporation was founded in 1916 and is headquartered in Kusatsu, Japan.

5852.T.summary: Ahresty Corporation engages in the aluminum die casting, aluminum, and proprietary products businesses in Japan, North America, and Asia. The company engages in manufacturing and sale of auto parts, general engine parts, industrial machinery parts, and dies. It is also involved in smelting, production, and sale of aluminum alloy ingots. In addition, the company manufactures and sells MOVAFLOR, a proprietary raised floor system used in clean rooms, data centers, factories, offices, etc.; and peripheral equipment for die cast production. The company was formerly known as Fuso Light Alloys Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ahresty Corporation in 1988. Ahresty Corporation was founded in 1938 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

5922.T.summary: Nasu Denki-Tekko Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells steel tower, steel structure, overhead wire material, transportation system materials, and underground wire materials in Japan. It offers transmission, telecommunication, and lighting towers; and overhead wire materials, such as insulators, resin covers, wire rods, and antenna support for information communication. The company also constructs communication towers, underground facilities, and road facilities, as well as engages in deterioration diagnosis and recycling of galvanized products. In addition, it provides surface treatment, such as hot-dip galvanized aluminum alloy plating, zinc phosphate treatment, and various coatings; steel pipe and composite column; and hydrogen storage alloy systems. The company serves electric power and power related, telecommunications and related companies; ministry of land, infrastructure, and transport and tourism; the ministry of internal affairs and communications; ministry of defense; other government agencies; and highway, construction, and railroad companies. Nasu Denki-Tekko Co., Ltd. was founded in 1929 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

5955.T.summary: Yamashina Corporation plans, manufactures, and sells metal products in Japan, China, Hong Kong, and Thailand. The company offers tapping fasteners for metals, resins, and thin plates; aluminum alloy fasteners, CFRP fasteners, loosening prevention fasteners, caulking bolts, washer built-in screws, and head shape products; and custom-made products, such as neck tight screws and small metal parts, as well as other products for weight reduction, prevention of loosening, thin plate fastening, and electric corrosion measures. It serves automobile, home appliances/industrial equipment, medical equipment, robot, and architecture industries. The company was founded in 1917 and is headquartered in Kyoto, Japan.

5987.T.summary: ONEX Corporation provides metal heat treatment, remediation, and processing services in Japan. The company's metal heat treatment services include carburizing, carbonitriding, vacuum, high frequency, bright heat, and aluminum alloy heat treatment. Its services also comprise quenching and tempering, nitriding, gas nitrocarburizing, shot peening, and PVD coating treatment services, as well as heat treatments for oversized parts. The company offers its heat treatment services for a range of components used in the automotive, industrial machinery, machine tool, and construction equipment sectors. In addition, it provides logistics and information system development services. The company was formerly known as Oya Netsushori Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Onex Corporation in July 1991. Onex Corporation was founded in 1951 and is headquartered in Atsugi, Japan.

5994.T.summary: Fine Sinter Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automobile parts, railroad vehicle parts, and hydraulic equipment worldwide. Its automotive parts include engines, shock absorbers, transmission and parts, steering parts, body parts, and brakes. The company also offers pantograph contact strips and brake linings for railroad vehicles; industrial machinery, such as industrial machinery parts, business machines/home electric appliances, and sintered vents; and hydraulic units comprising hydraulic equipment and hydraulic packages. Fine Sinter Co., Ltd. was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Kasugai, Japan.

5999.T.summary: Ihara Science Corporation manufactures and sells fittings, valves, hoses, and pipes primarily in Japan, Taiwan, China, South Korea, North America, Southeast Asia, Europe, and Australia. It offers fittings, including double ferule type tube fittings, resin tube fittings, vinyl hose and weldless fittings, automatic weld fittings, metal gasket seal type fittings, metal gasket seal fittings, and swivel joints, as well as quick joint fittings, biting fittings, high-pressure screw-in/insert welded joint, hose joint, branch header piping, and inline filter. The company also provides bellow and metal diaphragm, ball, stop, stainless check, and piston valves; metal flexible tubes, precision carbon steel galvanized steel pipe, and stainless steel tubes; and tube cutters and pre-setting devices. The company was formerly known as Ihara High Pressure Fittings Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Ihara Science Corporation in October 1997. Ihara Science Corporation was founded in 1941 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

5EB.SI.summary: CFM Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, designs, fabricates, and sells tools-and-dies used for the manufacture of stamped metal components. The company operates through Metal Stamping; Tooling; Components and Parts and Others; and Cleanroom Products segments. The Metal Stamping segment manufactures metal plates and metal stampings. The Tooling segment manufactures and fabricates engineering tools and dies. The Components and Parts and Others segment is involved in trading other components and parts. This segment also engages in warehousing and service logistic businesses. The Cleanroom Products segment engages in trading disposables and wearables for use in cleanroom, bio-medical, laboratories, and hospitals. The company serves electronics, automotive, telecommunications, technology, M&E, and pharmaceutical industries. It operates in Singapore, Malaysia, the United States, the Slovak Republic, the Czech Republic, the Netherlands, and internationally. CFM Holdings Limited was founded in 1979 and is based in Singapore.

601399.SS.summary: SINOMACH HEAVY EQUIPMENT GROUP CO.,LTD engages in the research and development, design, manufacture, and sale of technical and new energy equipment in China and internationally. It offers heavy-duty castings and forgings, such as protecting ring, runner forgings, and water turbine high-pressure (HP) and medium pressure (MP) casing forgings, as well as HP, MP, and low pressure (LP) rotors for thermal power stations; and nuclear power and pressure vessels, including nuclear pressurized equipment, large vessels for chemical industry, and high pressure vessels, as well as synthetic ammonia, petrochemical, ethylene, polypropylene, and coal chemical equipment. The company also provides driving parts comprising heavy duty gear wheels, medium hardened and hardened teeth surface gears, reducers, screw down worm gears, spherical double envelop worms and worm gears, heavy duty spline shafts, spline bushings, various racks, coiler mandrel shafts, drum-shaped teeth couplings and spindles, and other spare parts; and aviation die forgings. In addition, it offers various crushers, vertical cement grinding mills, dissepiment and vibration feeders, screw sand mixers, heavy duty soil spreaders, and spare parts; and gantry, overhead traveling, tower, and other cranes, as well as hoists for use in the metallurgy, building construction, road construction, chemical, and silicate industries. The company was formerly known as China Erzhong Group (Deyang) Heavy Industries Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to SINOMACH HEAVY EQUIPMENT GROUP CO.,LTD in March 2018. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Deyang City, China. SINOMACH HEAVY EQUIPMENT GROUP CO.,LTD operates as a subsidiary of China National Machinery Industry Corporation.

601700.SS.long_name: Changshu Fengfan Power Equipment Co., Ltd.
601700.SS.summary: Changshu Fengfan Power Equipment Co., Ltd. engages in the production and sale of angle steel towers, steel pipe composite towers, pipelines, substation structural supports, steel pipe poles, steel structure parts, and other products in China. It is also involved in the sale of fuel oil and asphalt; metal products; raw materials for textiles and knitwear; chemical products; and non-ferrous metals. In addition, the company engages in the provision of mergers and acquisitions, corporate assets reorganizations, asset management, and investment management services; management consulting, marketing planning, market information consulting, and planning services. The company also exports its products to Australia, Algeria, Bangladesh, Pakistan, Poland, Iran, Iraq, South Korea, Myanmar, Tajikistan, Africa, Congo, Peru, Chile, Equatorial Guinea, etc. Changshu Fengfan Power Equipment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Changshu, China.

603112.SS.summary: Shanxi Huaxiang Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells precision products, engineering products, resin sand products, and other products in China and internationally. It offers precision products, including auto parts, compressor castings, power fittings, railway parts, and pump valve pipe castings and other accessories; engineering products for use in logistics handling, construction machinery, aerial work platforms, port machinery, loading systems, agricultural parts, and drilling and foundation industries; resin sand products for use in industries, such as motors, fluid control, chassis transmission, air compressors, industrial robots, wind power, and mining machinery; and other products. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Linfen, China.

603159.SS.summary: Shanghai Yahong Moulding Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures medium and small-sized precise plastic moulds. The company is based in Shanghai, China.

603278.SS.summary: Shandong Daye Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and distributes bead wires, steel cords, hose wires, and complex products in China. The company is based in Zhucheng, China.

603308.SS.summary: Anhui Yingliu Electromechanical Co., Ltd. develops, manufactures, and sells high-precision steel casted and machined components in China, Europe, and the United States. It offers various steel castings, including intermediate and finished products, as well as investment castings. The company also offers nuclear products for nuclear equipment manufacturers and technology providers. It serves various industries comprising petroleum and natural gas; electric power generation, including nuclear, coal-fired, hydro, and wind plants; mining machinery devices; construction machinery, chemicals flow-control, medical, refrigeration flow-control, and environment flow-control equipment; and railroad, ship, and other transport equipment. Anhui Yingliu Electromechanical Co., Ltd. is based in Hefei, China.

603527.SS.long_name: Anhui Zhongyuan New Materials Co., Ltd.
603527.SS.summary: Anhui Zhongyuan New Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and service of high precision purple copper belts in China. The company's purple copper belt is used as a material in communication cables, electric power cables, transformers, copper coated aluminum, lead frame materials, heat sinks, heat exchangers, new energy batteries, and other products. It serves communication, electronics, electric power, electrical equipment, and other industries. The company is headquartered in Wuhu, China.

603577.SS.summary: Qingdao Huijintong Power Equipment Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells various galvanized and painted steel structures primarily in China. The company offers lattice steel towers, UHV towers, steel tubular towers, microwave communication towers, steel poles, substation structures, electrified railway structures, wind power generation equipment, photovoltaic power generation equipment, etc. It also provides electric power tower parts, fasteners, and electric power line accessories; marine floating structures, and equipment and fittings for marine engineering; inspection and testing services for steel structures and metal materials; and ocean engineering and new material technology R&D, technology promotion and transfer, and technical consultation services. It serves State Grid, China Southern Grid, and power generation companies. The company also exports its products to Canada, Myanmar, Pakistan, Kyrgyzstan, Australia, Italy, Nigeria, Sri Lanka, Laos, France, Israel, Mongolia, and internationally. Qingdao Huijintong Power Equipment Co.,Ltd. is based in Qingdao, China.

603626.SS.summary: Kunshan Kersen Science & Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells precision metallic components. It offers 3C electronic consumer goods comprising laptop C and D keys, buttons, medium plates of pad, hinges, sports bracelets, volume keys, camera keys, mobile phone card holders, watch shells, camera lens rings, camera hinges, power keys, and charging treasure metal shells. The company also provides medical equipment parts, including square tubes, nails, drill guiders, shafts, aluminum tubes, connectors, pipes, and bone nails; solar power ground pole and interlock assembly products; and auto parts, such as shaft sleeves, governor shafts, adjusting screws, nozzle clamps, injector inner metal plates, and guided needles. It serves IT, medical, auto, and general appliance 3C industries worldwide. Kunshan Kersen Science & Technology Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Kunshan, China.

603890.SS.long_name: Suzhou Chunqiu Electronic Technology Co., Ltd.
603890.SS.summary: Suzhou Chunqiu Electronic Technology Co., Ltd. together with its subsidiaries, processes and manufactures notebook computer components in China and internationally. The company also designs, manufactures, and sells precision plastic molds and injection molds; and electronic modules. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Kunshan, China.

603917.SS.summary: Ningbo Heli Technology Co., Ltd. designs, develops, manufactures, and sells casting molds in China and internationally. It offers die-casting molds, gravity low pressure casting molds, gravity casting molds, molding lines, hot and cold core box molds, and hot forming stamping molds. The company also develops and manufactures aluminum alloy materials. The company was formerly known as Ningbo Heli Mould Technology Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Ningbo Heli Technology Co., Ltd. in June 2021. Ningbo Heli Technology Co., Ltd. is based in Ningbo, China.

603985.SS.long_name: Jiangyin Hengrun Heavy Industries Co., Ltd
603985.SS.summary: Jiangyin Hengrun Heavy Industries Co., Ltd manufactures and sells flanges and forgings in China. It offers ring forgings, nozzles, support rings for turbines, spherical and main shaft forgings, slewing bearings, rolling ring and free forgings, flanges for large-scale wind tower foundations, packing of wind power flanges, forged flanges, and long welding neck flanges, as well as bearing and gear blanks, and tube sheets and discs. The company was formerly known as Jiangyin Henrun Flange Co., Ltd. Jiangyin Hengrun Heavy Industries Co., Ltd was founded in 2003 and is based in Jiangyin, China.

605123.SS.long_name: Wuxi Paike New Materials Technology Co.,Ltd.
605123.SS.summary: Wuxi Paike New Materials Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells forgings in China. The company's principal products include ring forgings and various types of free forgings. It offers forgings for chemical and petroleum, machinery, valve, power, marine, and high end products. The company was founded in 2006 and is based in Wuxi, China.

6138.T.summary: Dijet Industrial Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of cemented carbide tools worldwide. It offers tuff modular system, drill, indexable and solid end mill, face mill, coated and non-coated inserts, sintered CBN and diamond inserts, cermet inserts, and wear and impact resistant tool products. The company was formerly known as Hyakunen Industrial Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Dijet Industrial Co., Ltd. in June 1954. Dijet Industrial Co., Ltd. was founded in 1938 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.

6150.T.summary: Takeda Machinery Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells metalworking machines and tools in Japan. It provides small shaped steel processing machines, flat plate drilling machines, H-shaped steel drilling machines, and steel plate processing machines. The company also offers circular saw machines, such as shaped steel cutting, unprocessed steel cutting, and pipe cutting machines, as well as dies. Takeda Machinery Co., Ltd. was founded in 1966 and is headquartered in Nomi, Japan.

6235.TW.summary: Waffer Technology Corporation manufactures and sells light metal products. The company primarily engages in the provision of light-metal solution of magnesium and aluminum alloy, mold and tooling research and development, magnesium alloy injection and die-casting, CNC, and painting and assembly of vertical integration OEM/ODM processing. Its products include cosmetic and internal parts for notebooks; handheld scanners and mobile phone parts; camera, video cam, projector, and monitoring optical parts; and auto parts, as well as other products, such as wearable, tool, and sports products. The company also manufactures and processes automotive aluminum alloy die-cast tools, 3C product magnesium injection tools, and other light metal die-casting tools, as well as fixtures and gauges. It serves medical, industrial, telecommunications, construction, automotive, sporting goods, aeronautical, transportation, national defense, and other industries. The company was formerly known as Waffer Industrial Company, Limited and changed its name to Waffer Technology Corporation in 2000. Waffer Technology Corporation was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.

6362.T.summary: Ishii Iron Works Co., Ltd. operates as an engineering, procurement, and construction contractor worldwide. The company constructs low-temperature tanks and terminals; LNG tanks and satellite terminals; spherical tanks and gas holders; and atmospheric storage tanks, as well as provides maintenance services. It also provides wet and dry seal type gas holders; leisure facility works, including stainless steel swimming pool facilities, adventure sliders and coasters, tile and running pools, and tunnels, as well as swimming pools with moving floor, artificial waves, and flowing systems; and specialized construction works. In addition, the company engages in the anticorrosive film and waterproofing construction of reservoirs; and seismic analysis; and provision of waterworks equipment, such as emergency drinking water tanks, elevated water tanks, and water distribution pools, as well as environmental equipment comprising sludge digestion gas systems, combustion furnaces for surplus gas, gas processing facilities for waste, and waste disposal site gas processing facilities. Further, it provides gas generation systems that include generation plants for city gas and P-13A facilities; and steel structures, which comprise steel frames and towers for iron bridges, steel chimneys, artworks, and silos for crops, as well as rust inhibitors. Additionally, the company offers condominiums, logistics facilities, commercial facilities, and solar power generation equipment. It serves companies dealing with petroleum, chemical engineering, steel mill, electric and gas power, government authority, and various public organizations. The company was founded in 1900 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

6433.T.summary: HEPHAIST Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells linear motion parts, ultra-precision processing products, and system products in Japan. The company offers linear motion products, including linear ball bearings, linear bushes, linear bushes with flanges, miniature linear bushes, splines, and circular arc roller guides; system products, such as XYqz stages, ultrasonic stages, control devices, small manipulators, and combination stages; and precision grinding and ultra-precision finishing products, and processed parts. It also provides alignment systems, spherical rolling joints, and ordered machining products. The company was incorporated in 1962 and is headquartered in Kawagoe, Japan.

6488.T.summary: Yoshitake Inc. manufactures and sells fluid control valves in Japan and internationally. It offers pressure reducing valves, drain separators, safety and relief valves, strainers, solenoid/motor/air operated valves, temperature regulators, steam traps/radiator products, and primary pressure regulating valves. The company also provides expansion and flexible joints, sight glasses, air vents/outs, noiseless heaters and vacuum relief valves, fluid control products, assist/pumping traps, and hot water systems, as well as KAWAKI products. Its products are used in machines and plants, buildings, public facilities, and others. The company was formerly known as Yoshitake Works, Ltd. and changed its name to Yoshitake Inc. in July 1990. Yoshitake Inc. was founded in 1944 and is headquartered in Nagoya, Japan.

6497.T.summary: Hamai Industries Ltd. manufactures and sells precision machine equipment, valves, and high-pressure gas related equipment in Japan. The company leases real estate properties. It also offers LPG cylinder valves; ball valves for factories, construction machinery, food machinery, water treatment equipment, and semiconductor manufacturing equipment; natural gas automotive valves; medical gas valves; and high pressure gas valves, as well as valves for hydrogen fuel cell vehicles, and fire extinguishers and fire extinguishing equipment; and safety plug for hydrogen tanks. The company was formerly known as Hamai Factory Limited and changed its name to Hamai Industries Ltd. in April 1991. Hamai Industries Ltd. was founded in 1927 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

688122.SS.summary: Western Superconducting Technologies Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells superconducting materials and titanium alloys for superconducting magnets and aviation industry. The company offers superconducting materials, such as NbTi and Nb3Sn. It also provides titanium alloy bars, wires, billets, and discs. Western Superconducting Technologies Co., Ltd. serves military, energy, and medical industries. Western Superconducting Technologies Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is based in Xi'an, China.

688379.SS.long_name: Hangzhou Huaguang Advanced Welding Materials Co., Ltd.
688379.SS.summary: Hangzhou Huaguang Advanced Welding Materials Co., Ltd. engages in the research and fabrication of welding materials; and provision of welding solutions in China and internationally. The company primarily produces copper-based and silver-based welding materials in the forms of rods, rings, wires, strips, foils, powder, paste, flux-cored, and flux-coated. Its products include silver brazing, copper-phosphorus brazing, high copper brazing, brass brazing, aluminum brazing, flux-cored brazing, and flux-coated brazing alloys, as well as brazing flux and alloys for vacuum welding. The company's products are useed in the industries of refrigeration, household appliances, machinery, electric appliances, aeronautics, petrochemical, automobiles, tools, hard alloys, measurements, new energy equipment, bathroom facilities, railroad systems, etc. Hangzhou Huaguang Advanced Welding Materials Co., Ltd. was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Hangzhou, China.

6998.T.summary: Nippon Tungsten Co., Ltd. provides rare metal and fine ceramic products primarily composed of tungsten based on powder metallurgical technology. Its products include tungsten wire and rod, tungsten ribbon and SC molybdenum; resistance welding electrodes, TD/TCP/Starter contacts, silicon nitride, and roll press machine that are used in automobile manufacturing; and heavy alloys. The company's products also consist of discharge tungsten wire, electric discharge machining electrodes for use in electric machines and tools; cemented carbides and ceramic materials for use in wear resistant and shock resistant tools; NT die cutters and fine ceramic cutting tools; seal rings and sleeves, and corrosion resistant sliding materials; and porous ceramics for transferring workpieces. In addition, it is also engaged in real estate leasing and management; renewable energy power generation business; and sale of electricity. Nippon Tungsten Co., Ltd. was founded in 1931 and is headquartered in Fukuoka, Japan.

7414.T.summary: Onoken Co., Ltd. engages in the sale, fabrication, and import/export of steel in Japan. It offers steel plates, checker plates, expanded metals, hot rolled steel coils, and wire rods; and steel in various shapes, such as H-beams, angles, channels, flat bars, steel pipes, and column steels, as well as deformed steel bars. The company also sells construction materials, which include outside walls, sashes, roofs, fences, versatile steel boards, tiles, and slates, as well as ironware products. It serves the fabrication, shipbuilding, construction, equipment manufacturing, and coil center secondary product manufacturing markets. The company was formerly known as Ono Kenzai Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Onoken Co., Ltd. in February 1957. Onoken Co., Ltd. was founded in 1925 and is headquartered in Kitakyushu, Japan.

7637.T.summary: Hakudo Co., Ltd. processes and distributes metal materials primarily in Japan, China, Thailand, and Vietnam. It offers aluminum plates, bars, and tubes; stainless steel plates; and elongated copper products, as well as special steel, titanium, and engineering plastics. The company was founded in 1932 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.

7RY.F.summary: Ryerson Holding Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, processes and distributes industrial metals in the United States, Canada, Mexico, and China. The company offers a line of products in carbon steel, stainless steel, alloy steels, and aluminum, as well as nickel and red metals in various shapes and forms, including coils, sheets, rounds, hexagons, square and flat bars, plates, structurals, and tubing. It also provides various processing services, such as bending, beveling, blanking, blasting, burning, cutting-to-length, drilling, embossing, flattening, forming, grinding, laser cutting, machining, notching, painting, perforating, polishing, punching, rolling, sawing, scribing, shearing, slitting, stamping, tapping, threading, welding, or other techniques to process materials. The company serves various industries, including commercial ground transportation, metal fabrication and machine shops, industrial machinery and equipment manufacturing, consumer durable equipment, HVAC manufacturing, construction equipment manufacturing, food processing and agricultural equipment manufacturing, and oil and gas. Ryerson Holding Corporation was founded in 1842 and is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois.

8027.HK.summary: KPM Holding Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the design, fabrication, installation, and maintenance of signage and related products in Singapore. The company offers its products in the public sector for roads, education institutions, public housing flats/compounds, defense compound, airport and national parks, and others; and private sector for commercial and industrial buildings, private residential buildings, hospitals, and fast food chains. It also provides subcontracting services for fitting-out work to commercial premises and residential developments, as well as renovation services for premises. KPM Holding Limited was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Singapore.

8087.T.summary: Furusato Industries,Ltd. provides steel frame building supplies for steel fabricators in Japan. It operates through Equipment & Tools, Machine & Facility, and Construction & Piping Products segments. The company also offers piping products for buildings and production facilities; automation materials and industrial equipment, such as consumable supplies and tools, and machines and tools manufacturers and retailers; and machine and tools for the automotive industry. In addition, it provides housing equipment, including kitchen equipment, bathroom equipment, washing stand, gas equipment, boiler equipment, sanitary equipment, and exterior materials; and surveillance cameras, access control equipment, other security products, and related consulting and technical services. Further, the company sells cutting tools, machine tools, and peripherals; and imports, exports, and sells building supplies, equipment, and tools. The company was formerly known as Furusato Tekkosho Ltd. and changed its name to Furusato Industries,Ltd. in 1973. Furusato Industries,Ltd. was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
